name: Mercedes-Benz GLB
description: The price of Mercedes-Benz GLB, a 7 seater SUV, ranges from Rs. 60.80  - 67.80 Lakh. It is available in 3 variants, with engine options ranging from 1332 to 1950 cc and a choice of 1 transmission: Automatic. GLB has an NCAP rating of 5 stars and comes with 7 airbags. Mercedes-Benz GLB is available in 5 colours.

variants.variant_name: GLB 200 Progressive Line 1332 cc, Petrol, Automatic (DCT), 160 bhp
GLB 220d Progressive Line 1950 cc, Diesel, Automatic (DCT), 188 bhp
GLB 220d 4MATIC AMG Line 1950 cc, Diesel, Automatic (DCT), 188 bhp
